What type of problem?: Backup Describe your problem: Hello, I must admit that I am very dissatisfied with the customer service, I will not hesitate to share it with those around me. It's been a week and a half since I asked to restore my documents deleted by mistake in the <NAME> account and I still do not have them. The restore deadline is 14 days according to your emails, and the deadline expires on Friday. I absolutely need my documents. Thank you!
